noun.description: A mark or character used as a conventional representation of an object, function, or process, e.g. the letter or letters standing for a chemical element or a character in musical notation.
A thing that represents or stands for something else, especially a material object representing something abstract.
examples: the limousine was another symbol of his wealth and authority

origin: Late Middle English (denoting the Apostles' Creed): from Latin symbolum symbol, Creed (as the mark of a Christian), from Greek sumbolon mark, token, from sun- with + ballein to throw.
